mosinstall.name: Google Site Map
mosinstall.author: Chef Groovy
mosinstall.description: Creates a sitemap for use in Google webmaster tools. Leave off gallery ID to list all files in database.

param.name: DateFormat
param.label: Format for lastmod element.
param.description: DOES NOT WORK NOW. Uses date the file was uploaded. Use Y-m-d\TH:i:s\Z to show date and time.

param.name: IncludeRootGallery
param.label: Include Root Gallery in Sitemap
param.description: DOES NOT WORK NOW. Include Root Gallery in Sitemap
